title: Analyze project structure and dependencies
description: Examine codebase organization, identify all modules, services, and integration points between betting-ops and live-betting systems

title: Audit backend security vulnerabilities
description: Review authentication, authorization, input validation, SQL injection, XSS, API security, and data protection mechanisms

title: Audit backend performance and scalability
description: Analyze database queries, API response times, memory usage, concurrent connections, and system bottlenecks

title: Audit frontend security vulnerabilities
description: Review client-side validation, XSS protection, CSRF tokens, secure storage, and data exposure risks

title: Audit frontend UX and accessibility
description: Evaluate user interface design, navigation, responsiveness, accessibility compliance, and user experience flow

title: Audit system integration and data flow
description: Test API endpoints, data synchronization, real-time updates, error handling, and cross-component communication

title: Audit regulatory compliance and data privacy
description: Verify GDPR compliance, data retention policies, audit logging, and regulatory requirements for betting operations

title: Generate comprehensive audit report
description: Consolidate findings, categorize by severity, provide evidence, and create actionable recommendations
